comments: The homework does NOT reflect class lectures. The quizzes and tests are insane, worded completely different than the homework or the way he himself taught it. He makes up the notes as he goes so you waste time watching him type, and he stumbles through the lectures. If you want to try and teach yourself economics go for it, otherwise, pass on him.

the questions in his aplia homework has not yet been taught. His teaching in class is so boring, he tried so hard to make the class interesting yet it isnt working for me. he\'s trying to be funny and fail. don\'t take his class. DON\'T TAKE HIS CLASS.

Okay, Sam Le is not a bad teacher. He actually teaches you the concepts of economics but his quizzes and tests suck. Just know how to do the processes that he teaches and you\'re golden. Also don\'t skip class because he goes over a lot of information. He constantly asks if anyone has questions and is willing to go over what he said. Grades on curve

Impossible to fail unless your a dumbass. Do practice sheets and you will Ace quizzes/tests. Make sure to read all the questions thoroughly. No book needed. Do your work, get the grade you worked for.

DON\'T take Le! Failing quiz & test averages should drop a hint about his teaching. Gets upset if someone doesn\'t understand cuz thinks everything is obvious. Doesn\'t thoroughly walk thru examples so most of class ends up confused. Hard to study w/ no hw/textbook; we only get notes & used problems. I found multivariable calculus easier. Good Luck!

This was an online course.Aplia is extremely time consuming. He grades 25% on Aplia,Discussion Boards,Midterm and Final.The midterm and final are 100 questions long. Be prepared to do many hours of homework even though it is online.I took it online because I hate sitting through lectures.I wouldn\'t take him again!!!

Do not take this teacher he is terrible terrible terrible!!!!!! monotonous, examples dont match on the quiz and your stuck doing exercises from google if you have it on your phone. Noone in class had time to finish the midterm. he gives 50 min to do a 2 hour test. Just terrible teacher!

Easiest instructor at HCC. He teaches straight from his notes and not from the book, which saves you $150 because you don\'t have to buy a book. No homework at all whatsoever, just practice worksheets he gives you for you to practice. Fun class for the most parts, he tries using examples we can relate to. Grades at a curve which really helps.

omg! I have no idea what he was talking in class. When u have a question, he will make u more confused. He grades students unclearly. U cant know where u are in his class. I thought I was doing well in class, midterm and final were ok, but then my GPA decreased really bad because of ECO class. Thanks to him >"<

This guy does not teach worth a damn! He doesn\'t incorporate the book at all, he doesn\'t explain his points clearly at all, and he grades on a curve because no one can pass the dang thing. I\'m a smart person, but you have to be damn near brilliant to follow his instruction.

He is not helpful he only has one day he is available for office hours and he really won\'t make time available other then that. The only good things is no homework no text book b/c he doesn\'t follow it.. everything is based of his notes so you need to be there everyday or you will miss something

He is the easiest instructor in HLCC most of people in class get over 3.7 or more... u dont have to come to class and before the quiz he will tell you what questions will be on the exam.. super easy... but it is also the bad things even if u r study really hard, most of people get a 2.0 gpa so..

I took his online course for winter 08. Aplia is SUPER hard! takes up tons of time so I would recommend doing them as soon as you can. Midterms and Finals are difficult but you just got to know the materials.

The only good thing about this class is that Sam has a mild sense of humor and he doesn\'t require you to buy books. His quizzes are okay, midterm and exams are hard if you don\'t dedicate your life to studying. Don\'t bother asking questions, he\'ll make you feel stupid and says dumb comments like "This should be simple look back in your notes!!"

I loved his class his quiz and mid term were easiest.. if you go to class everyday you will definitely get over 3.8~4.0 I really recomend his class I took some other instructor\'s econ classes but I did not like it... I do not want to say his class is helpful but you can get easy A
